sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('
    select s.name SchemaName,
        t.name TableName
        from sys.tables t
        join sys.schemas s
        on s.schema_id = t.schema_id
        where s.name = ''', pipeline().parameters.schemaname,'''
        ')

ifFalseActivities.name: Copy table to parquet in adls

expression.value:
@and(equals(variables('partnerCertPassDate run'),'SUCCESS'),
and(equals(variables('newsSentiment run'),'SUCCESS'),
and(equals(variables('partnerLicenseSales run'),'SUCCESS'),
equals(variables('certificationLatestVersion run'),'SUCCESS'))))
